body.p: Each WebHelp Publishing Template includes a descriptor file which defines the meta-data associated with that template. It is an XML file that defines all the resources included by a template like HTML page templates, CSS, JS, fonts, transformation parameters.
The template descriptor file should have the .opt extension (debugger.opt) and it should be located in the root folder associated with the template.
body.note: It is recommended to edit the template descriptor in the oXygen XML editor because to get content completion and validation.
